original_title: All the Way... A Decade of Song
overview: All the Way... A Decade of Song is the second one-off American television special by Canadian singer Celine Dion that was broadcast by CBS on 24 November 1999. The special was a promotion for her first English-language greatest hits album of the same name, All the Way... A Decade of Song. The special was filmed on 7 October 1999 at the reopening of Radio City Music Hall in New York City.
title: All the Way... A Decade of Song
